name: The Curse of Tutankhamun
description:
My First Game I ever finished and posted. Done for a 7th grade project.

Created by Cletus G. AKA Gavin Alligood. Credits to music goes to Kevin Macleod and Brandon Fiechter.

Story: Your car crashes on the road of Quesm Al Wahat Al Khargah in Egypt, near the Valley of Kings. Start exploring, and you could find King Tutankhamuns actual resting place... and more than just the place.
